hiveArticle.title: Livin' The Steem: How 2 Anarchists Defected From the USSA to Mexico On Only $50, A Hope & A Steem
hiveArticle.body:
http://i.imgur.com/2oxHoEr.jpg
I had the opportunity to interview one of the most popular writers on Steemit this week, @lily-da-vine. As you'll see, @lily-da-vine is actually both John and Lily. But, far more interesting than the fortunes they have been making on Steemit is their story. They fled the US because the government wanted to kidnap them and put them in a cage for 25 years for trying to help sick people by supplying cannabis which cured their issues. They had only $50 in their pocket and no passports but managed to make it all the way down to Anarchapulco and since have started numerous new businesses and are currently making a fortune writing on Steemit! The story is incredible and amazing and gives a lot of hope for many out there who don't have much money but want to live a freer, better life. You can see it here:
https://youtu.be/TwlKePRuwk0
If you aren't already you can follow Lily and John at @lily-da-vine . And, of course, you can follow me @jeffberwick for more interesting stories like these always posted first to Steemit!
